title: Choripan with Ranchitas Nacho Queso
ingredients: 4 Spanish chorizos or sausages of your choice
1 family-size bag of Ranchitas Nacho Queso
instructions: Step 1. Heat the oil in a skillet and cook the chorizos or sausages.
Step 2. Spread mustard on each bun, as much as you like.
Step 3. Place three Ranchitas Nacho Queso in each bun, then add the chorizos and a portion of guacamole.
description: The classic Guatemalan choripan elevated with the special touch of Ranchitas Nacho Queso. An explosion of flavor in every bite.
